project.name: tycho-features-site-archetype
project.description: Creates Tycho eclipse feature set for OSGi development. A feature set includes: 1. Eclipse Feature - Standard eclipse feature. 2. Build parent - 3. Eclipse Target definition for p2 associated repository 4. Prepare - prepares any external OSGi bundles to be included in your target definition 5. P2 Repository 6. A WEB app to deploy your repository as a war
